description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Almost as soon as the playtest began, details for Nintendo's mysterious online Switch game started leaking online, including screenshots—which were immediately taken down. But descriptions of what the game is have survived the Nintendo copyright purge, and apparently it's a co-op sim building game that sounds like Minecraft-meets-Miiverse. In other news, Insomniac Games has confirmed that there are no plans to release story DLC for Marvel's Spider-Man 2, but hopes are still alive that they'll do a smaller game like the Miles Morales title that was released in 2020, only this one would presumably star Venom. And finally, we have story details on the new Batman: Arkham Shadow game, coming exclusively to Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest 3S.
Presented by Batman: Arkham Shadow. Only available on Meta Quest 3 and 3S.
title: Details of Nintendo's Mysterious Online Game Leaked Online - IGN Daily Fix
We might see more of Venom someday 👀

description: In an exclusive coming out of New York Comic Con from Collider, the media outlet reported that Avengers: Doomsday will officially begin filming in the spring. This comes from Joe Russo, one of the directors of the upcoming Marvel film and of the famed Russo Brothers. The film will mark the return of actor Robert Downey Jr. to the MCU as Dr. Doom, and will also feature the Fantastic Four. We’ll see Reed Richards, Sue and Johnny Storm, as well as The Thing in next year's The Fantastic Four: First Steps. As for who else we can expect to see in the upcoming Avengers movie: The Thunderbolts and Benedict Cumberbatch’s Dr. Strange are all confirmed to make an appearance in the movie. Avengers: Doomsday is slated to release in May of 2026, so it won’t be too long before we see Robert Downey Jr’s return. But the question is, will his villainous character be teased well before its release? It seems very likely we’ll see Dr. Doom make an appearance or get mentioned in The Fantastic Four First St
title: Avengers: Doomsday Production Date Revealed At NYCC 2024 - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
Why Sonic X Shadow Generations is AMAZING

description:
Check out this teaser trailer for Moana 2 to learn more about this upcoming Disney animated musical film. 

Walt Disney Animation Studios’ epic animated musical “Moana 2” reunites Moana (voice of Auli‘i Cravalho) and Maui (voice of Dwayne Johnson) three years later for an expansive new voyage alongside a crew of unlikely seafarers. After receiving an unexpected call from her wayfinding ancestors, Moana must journey to the far seas of Oceania and into dangerous, long-lost waters for an adventure unlike anything she’s ever faced. Directed by David Derrick Jr., Jason Hand and Dana Ledoux Miller, and produced by Christina Chen and Yvett Merino, “Moana 2” features music by Grammy winners Abigail Barlow and Emily Bear, Grammy nominee Opetaia Foa‘i, and three-time Grammy winner Mark Mancina. Jared Bush and Miller are writing the film, which is executive produced by Jennifer Lee, Bush and Johnson. 

The film also features returning stars Rachel House (Moana’s Grandma, Tala), Temuera Morrison
title: Moana 2 - Official 'Big, Bad Matangi' Teaser Trailer (2024) Auli‘i Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson

description:
Watch the teaser trailer for The Strangers: Chapter 2, an upcoming movie starring Madelaine Petsch, Gabriel Basso, and Ema Horvath.

The Strangers: Chapter 2 is produced by Courtney Solomon, p.g.a., Mark Canton, p.g.a., Christopher Milburn, Charlie Dombek, Gary Raskin, and Alastair Burlingham. Based on characters created by Bryan Bertino. It is written by Alan R. Cohen & Alan Freedland.

The Strangers: Chapter 2, directed by Renny Harlin, is coming soon.
title: The Strangers: Chapter 2 - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Madelaine Petsch, Gabriel Basso

description:
Explore the Californian Redwoods and the expanded Coastal biome in Update 12 for Prehistoric Kingdom. Watch the latest Prehistoric Kingdom trailer to see what else is coming in Update 12, which brings new animals, including Apatosaurus, Brontosaurus, and Ankylosaurus to the zoo management simulation game. The update also features a new Rustic theme, updated official prefabs, the ability to research new staff training, and new tutorials. Prehistoric Kingdom is available now in PC Early Access (Steam and Epic Games Store), and Update 12 arrives on October 28, 2024.

#PrehistoricKingdom #Gaming #Games
title: Prehistoric Kingdom - Official Update 12 Trailer

description:
Ghost Face comes to the world of Hunt: Showdown 1896. Watch the Hunt: Showdown 1896 x Ghost Face Rampage collaboration trailer to see what to expect with the Rampage DLC, which includes one Hunter (Ghost Face), two weapons--the Hush (Frontier 73C Silencer) and Whisper (a Bornheim No. 3 Silencer)--and the Life Taker tool (a knife). Ghost Face Rampage will be available on Steam, Xbox Series X|S, and PS5 (PlayStation 5) on October 24, 2024.

#HuntShowdown #GhostFace #Gaming
title: Hunt: Showdown 1896: Ghost Face Rampage DLC - Official Collaboration Trailer

description:
Cut through the entire battlefield with his versatile swordsmanship. Renji Abarai takes the spotlight in this latest Bleach Rebirth of Souls trailer showcasing the character's abilities in action. A master of mid-range combat, Renji can risk it all unleashing "Bankai: Hihio Zabimaru". 

Bleach Rebirth of Souls will be released on PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC via Steam in 2025.

#Bleach #Gaming #Anime
title: Bleach Rebirth of Souls - Official Renji Abarai Character Trailer

description:
Worshippers of Cthulhu is available now in Steam Early Access. Watch the Worshippers of Cthulhu launch trailer to see gameplay and learn more about what awaits in this strategy simulation game. In Worshippers of Cthulhu, decide the fate of your followers, perform eldritch rituals, and master the art of city-building in a world where the line between sanity and madness blurs. Can you endure the horrors you unleash?

#WorshippersOfCthulhu #Gaming #Games
title: Worshippers of Cthulhu - Official Early Access Launch Trailer
Bellara joins the Veilguard! Visit IGN's Dragon Age hub to learn more. Presented by @dragonage

description:
Get a deep dive into the world and Atomfall gameplay in this latest trailer for the upcoming single-player first-person action survival game. The trailer introduces you to the story setting in the North of England based on the Windscale disaster of 1957, locations in Atomfall, your mission, the threats you'll face, various weapons, and more. Atomfall will be available on PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and PC in March 2025. 

Atomfall is inspired by the real-life events of the 1957 Windscale disaster and the story picks up five years later in a fictionalized quarantine zone that encompasses rolling countryside, valleys, caves and even a picturesque English village. 

But this picture-perfect postcard setting is a hostile landscape that hides a dark mystery. To get to the bottom of what happened at Windscale, you will need to navigate military encampments, delve through abandoned bunkers below ground, and risk your life in Pagan ruins.

#Atomfall #G
title: Atomfall - Official Gameplay and World First Look Trailer

description:
Call of Duty Black Ops 6 is set to be the most varied Call of Duty campaign ever! Watch Call of Duty developers from Raven Software reveal new BO6 details on how the Black Ops 6 campaign places an emphasis on blockbuster variety, and learn more about some of the Black Ops 6 missions.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and PC on October 25, 2024.

#CallOfDuty #BlackOps6 #Gaming
title: Black Ops 6 is Set to Be the Most Varied Call of Duty Campaign Ever

description:
Get your first look at the next major update to Barotrauma, called Unto the Breach. This update to the hit 2D survival-horror co-op role-playing submarine simulator adds new modes, enemies, locations, traps, puzzles, items, and a major PvP overhaul. Barotrauma's Unto the Breach update will be released tomorrow, October 22.

#Barotrauma #UndoTheBreach #IGN
title: Barotrauma: Official 'Unto the Breach' Update Trailer

description:
In the best way possible, something felt different when playing Lego Horizon Adventures as opposed to the countless other Lego games. It didn't feel like a Lego game; it felt like a game that just happened to be portrayed through a Lego lens. Previewed by Jada Griffin.

#LegoHorizonAdventures #Preview #IGN
title: Lego Horizon Adventures Feels More Horizon Than Lego

description:
Sonic X Shadow Generations was reviewed by Jada Griffin on PlayStation 5. Also available on PlayStation 4, Xbox, Switch, and PC. 

Sonic X Shadow Generations takes an already excellent game and spring jumps it to new heights at a blistering pace by doubling up the campaign length with creative level design, fantastic bosses, plenty of collectibles, and an appreciable graphical upgrade. While the brand-new Shadow content isn't necessarily long on its own, it adds a nice change of pace to the collection of all-time great Sonic stages Generations already contained, and there’s an exciting new story that’s filled in as you explore the overworld for collectibles, activities, and challenges. This bulked-up remaster soars far and above previous enhanced versions we've gotten in the Sonic franchise, and hopefully will be the gold standard Sega holds itself to when it decides to bring back other Sonic games from the past.

#SonicXShadowGenerations #IGN #Review
title: Sonic X Shadow Generations Review
